CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Birthdate ) ) , CASE(MONTH( Birthdate ), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12, "December", "None")+ ' '+TEXT(DAY(Birthdate))+','+' '+TEXT(Year(Birthdate)), '')
CustomField.label: Birth Date
